select * from
oa_synergy t1 LEFT JOIN oa_synergymx t2 ON t1.SYNERGY_ID=t2.SYNERGY_ID
oa_distributed t1 LEFT JOIN oa_distributedmx t2 ON t1.DISTRIBUTED_ID=t2.DISTRIBUTED_ID
oa_studyplan t1 LEFT JOIN oa_studyplanmx t2 ON t1.STUDYPLAN_ID=t2.STUDYPLAN_ID
oa_workplan t1 LEFT JOIN oa_workplanmx t2 ON t1.WORKPLAN_ID=t2.WORKPLAN_ID
oa_study t1
oa_conclusion t1

ORDER BY t2.TITLE,t2.CREATETIME

select u.`NAME` from ACT_HI_ACTINST ht1 left join ACT_HI_VARINST hv1 on ht1.TASK_ID_ = hv1.TASK_ID_ LEFT JOIN sys_user u ON u.USERNAME=ht1.ASSIGNEE_ where ht1.PROC_INST_ID_ = #{PROC_INST_ID_} AND ht1.ACT_ID_='QJ2' order by ht1.ID_ DESC LIMIT 1
select END_TIME_ from ACT_HI_ACTINST ht1 left join ACT_HI_VARINST hv1 on ht1.TASK_ID_ = hv1.TASK_ID_ where ht1.PROC_INST_ID_ = #{PROC_INST_ID_} order by ht1.ID_ DESC LIMIT 1
select ACT_NAME_ from ACT_HI_ACTINST ht1 left join ACT_HI_VARINST hv1 on ht1.TASK_ID_ = hv1.TASK_ID_ where ht1.PROC_INST_ID_ = #{PROC_INST_ID_} order by ht1.ID_ DESC LIMIT 1

select substring_index(((SUBSTRING(TEXT_, 1, CHAR_LENGTH(TEXT_)-4))),'>',-1) as content from ACT_HI_ACTINST ht1 left join ACT_HI_VARINST hv1 on ht1.TASK_ID_ = hv1.TASK_ID_ where ht1.PROC_INST_ID_ = #{PROC_INST_ID_} AND ht1.ACT_ID_=#{QJ} order by ht1.ID_ DESC LIMIT 1
